name: Graydle Dreidel Dragon
text:
1 Aqua type Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned: Destroy all other cards on the field. If this Synchro Summoned card is sent to the GY: Special Summon as many "Graydle" monsters as possible from the GY except "Graydle Dreidel Dragon". You can only use each effect of "Graydle Dreidel Dragon" once per turn.
